articles.title: Peter King's Football Morning In America Column: NFL Playoffs Divisional Round - NBC Sports - NBC Sports - NFL
articles.description: In 25 hours on the greatest playoff weekend in the 102-year history of professional football, each headline, one by one, overtook the last one:BENGALS KNOCK OFF 1 SEED TO REACH FIRST AFC TITLE GAME SINCE 1988 NINERS KNOCK OFF 1 SEED ON 45-YARD FIELD GOAL AT :…
articles.content:
